protocol.name: P-MEXP-8601
protocol.text: Seeds of wild type Arabidopsis thaliana Columbia ecotype (col-0) were surface-sterilised in 1 ml 70% ethanol for 10 minutes and then dried for 1 hour. Seeds were grown on full-strength Murashige and Skoog (MS) Basal Medium with full-strength vitamin solution and 0.8% agar. Plates were sealed with microporous tape (SAFA Group, UK). Approximately 100 seeds were grown on each plate. After 48 - 72 hours stratification (in the dark at 4°C), plates were transferred to a AR36L3 A. thaliana growth cabinet (Percival, USA) with a 16- / 8-hour light / dark regime with a PFD of 130 mmol m-2 s-1 and day / night temperatures of 20 ± 2° C / 18 ± 2° C, for 10 days. Illumination was provided by 740 TL warm white lamps (Philips, UK) and 25 W incandescent lamps.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-8602
protocol.text: Agar plates containing 10 day old seedlings were transferred to a fumigation chamber inside the growth cabinet. Seedlings were exposed to ozone at a flow rate of 910 ml / min. Ozone was generated by a Dasibi (Glendale, CA, US) 1008-PC ozone generator and was bubbled through water before entering the chambers. Fumigation was carried out for six hours beginning at 10.00 GMT.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-8603
protocol.text: 100 seedlings were pooled from each agar plate.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-8604
protocol.text: Seedlings were harvested and snap-frozen in liquid nitrogen.  RNA was extracted using an RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen, UK) as recommended by the manufacturer. On-column DNase digestion with RNase-free DNase (Qiagen, UK) was carried out. For the final elution, 30 microlitres RNase-free water was used. To increase the final RNA concentration, a second elution was performed using the first eluate.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-8605
protocol.text: cRNA was labelled using the Affymetrix in vitro transcription Enzo Kit (Affymetrix GeneChip Technical Analysis Manual)

protocol.name: P-MEXP-8610
protocol.text: Expression values were generated using dChip software from normalized .CEL file data, using the PM/MM difference model, and log base 2 transformed.

protocol.name: P-MEXP-8619
protocol.text: Agar plates containing 10 day old seedlings were transferred to a fumigation chamber inside the growth cabinet. Seedlings were exposed to air passed through a charcoal / purafil filter to remove ambient ozone at a flow rate of 910 ml / min. Treatment was carried out for six hours beginning at 10.00 GMT.
